mean_en: the act or process of passing something from one person, place or thing to another; the act or process of sending out an electronic signal or message or of broadcasting a radio or television programme; a radio or television message or broadcast; the system in a vehicle by which power is passed from the engine to the wheels
sentence: This tower was built for mobile phone signal transmission.
sentence_trans: 这座塔是用来传输手机信号的。
